name: aa-ff: Pin Trump Edition
description:
Two games in one in this political satire game.

Pins (aa) - the object of the game is to stick the rotating Trump with pins. Tap the screen to pin the needle on Trump. Don't hit two in the same spot or its game over.

Needles (ff) - Trump is stuck with needles. Aim and stick the balls on the needles as he rotates. If you miss its game over.

Very challenging. More than 50 levels. Rotating Trump will change directions, slow and speed up. Most all prepare to laugh.

DISCLAIMER: Images included in the app are used under fair use for purposes of parody and political satire, as provided for in section 107 of the US Copyright Law. Reference to any celebrity, artist, musician, person, product, name, trademark, service mark, or company name is for descriptive purposes only and does not constitute or imply sponsorship, endorsement, or recommendation unless explicitly stated herein.

For entertainment purposes only.
